text: Zwonowice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lyski, within Rybnik County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland. It is west of the regional capital Katowice. ==Pastors== * Antoni Gasz (1942-1950) * Oswald Niedziela (1950-1954) * Jerzy Stefani, pastor of Lyski in the years 1954-1956 led ministry in Zwonowice * Antoni Kraus (1956-1962) * Kazimierz Wyciślik (1962-1978) * Antoni Pieczka (1978-1995) * Roman Gołąb (1995-present) Category:Villages in Poland Category:Silesian Voivodeship
title: Zwonowice
